articles.description: Novak Djokovic says he will return to the Australian Open next year if he is "fit, healthy and motivated" after retiring from his semi-final with injury.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Novak Djokovic unsure on Melbourne return after retiring injured from semi-final

articles.description: The Manchester United futures of Alejandro Garnacho and Marcus Rashford remain uncertain after Thursday's Europa League win against Rangers
articles.title: Man Utd 2-1 Rangers: Doubt remains over futures of Marcus Rashford and Alejandro Garnacho

articles.description: Defending champion Jannik Sinner will face Alexander Zverev in the Australian Open final after beating Ben Shelton in Melbourne.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Jannik Sinner beats Ben Shelton to set up Alexander Zverev final

articles.description: Nikola Jokic hits a 66ft three-pointer as the Denver Nuggets beat the Sacramento Kings 132-123.
articles.title: NBA: Nikola Jokic hits 66ft three-pointer for Denver v Sacramento

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs will aim to reach a third straight Super Bowl in this weekend's Conference Championships, although the Philadelphia Eagles are favourites to be this season's NFL champions.
articles.title: NFL play-offs: Josh Allen and Patrick Mahomes renew rivalry as Kansas City Chiefs chase 'three-peat'

articles.description: Emma Raducanu is looking for the seventh full-time coach of her professional career after Nick Cavaday steps back to "prioritise getting back to full health".
articles.title: Emma Raducanu looks for a new coach after Nick Cavaday steps back

articles.description: Naoya Inoue strengthens his pound-for-pound credentials by defending his undisputed super-bantamweight world title against Ye Joon Kim.
articles.title: Naoya 'Monster' Inoue beats Ye Joon Kim in fourth round

articles.description: Novak Djokovic is booed off court by some fans after retiring injured from his Australian Open semi-final against Alexander Zverev.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Novak Djokovic booed after retiring injured against Alexander Zverev in semi-finals

articles.description: Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta says the club are "actively looking" to sign a striker in the January transfer window.
articles.title: Mikel Arteta: Arsenal boss says club 'actively looking' to sign striker in January

articles.description: England replace Gus Atkinson with fellow pace bowler Brydon Carse for the second T20 against India in Chennai on Saturday.
articles.title: India v England: Bryson Carse in for Gus Atkinson for second T20
